name: BubbleBall
description:
This game was born with the concept of ‘Sea’ in the second UPC game jam. The design was pretty straight forward, he basically had to invert BolleyBall and have fish play with a bubble that tends to go up to the surface.

Two teams, two players on each team separated by a sea like net. Their goal, to score more than the other team by sending the bubble bellow the net to the other side.
